title: Panel
description: A specific panel for a project, built from a list of assemblies.

panelId.description: A unique identifier for this specific panel (e.g., a UUID or a project-based ID like '25-001-P1').

projectId.description: The main Project Number this panel belongs to (e.g., '25-001-10-100-1-10').

description.description: A human-readable name for this panel (e.g., 'Main Brewhouse Panel', 'Cellar Glycol Control').

assemblies.description: A list of assemblies (from the assembly library) required for this panel.

assemblyId.description: The 'assemblyId' of the template, linking to the assembly_schema.json.

quantity.description: The number of this assembly required.

oneOffComponents.description: Components added directly to the panel, not part of a standard assembly.

sku.description: The 'sku' of the component, linking to the component_schema.json.

quantity.description: The number of this component required.
